1004293:0.sentence: Judging from previous posts this used to be a good place, but not any longer.

1004293:1.sentence: We, there were four of us, arrived at noon - the place was empty - and the staff acted like we were imposing on them and they were very rude.

1004293:3.sentence: The food was lousy - too sweet or too salty and the portions tiny.

1014458:0.sentence: I have eaten at Saul, many times, the food is always consistently, outrageously good.

1014458:1.sentence: Saul is the best restaurant on Smith Street and in Brooklyn.

1014458:2.sentence: The duck confit is always amazing and the foie gras terrine with figs was out of this world.

1014458:3.sentence: The wine list is interesting and has many good values.

1016296:0.sentence: I was very disappointed with this restaurant.

1016296:4.sentence: Chow fun was dry; pork shu mai was more than usually greasy and had to share a table with loud and rude family.

1016296:5.sentence: I/we will never go back to this place again.

1028246:1.sentence: Service was devine, oysters where a sensual as they come, and the price can't be beat!!!

1032695:1.sentence: Everything is always cooked to perfection, the service is excellent, the decor cool and understated.

1032695:2.sentence: I had the duck breast special on my last visit and it was incredible.

1041457:2.sentence: The food is very average...the Thai fusion stuff is a bit too sweet, every thing they serve is too sweet here.

1041457:3.sentence: The only thing I moderately enjoyed was their Grilled Chicken special with Edamame Puree.

1041457:3_0.term: Grilled Chicken special with Edamame Puree

1041457:4.sentence: I had never had Edamame pureed before but I thought it was innovative and tasty (could've used a bit more salt).

1041457:6.sentence: The decor is night tho...but they REALLY need to clean that vent in the ceiling...its quite un-appetizing, and kills your effort to make this place look sleek and modern.

1053543:2.sentence: Their sake list was extensive, but we were looking for Purple Haze, which wasn't listed but made for us upon request!

1053543:3.sentence: The spicy tuna roll was unusually good and the rock shrimp tempura was awesome, great appetizer to share!

1053543:4.sentence: We went around 9:30 on a Friday and it had died down a bit by then so the service was great!

1058221:3.sentence: however, it's the service that leaves a bad taste in my mouth.

1058221:4.sentence: i happen to have a policy that goes along with a little bit of self-respect, which includes not letting a waiter intimidate me, i.e. make me feel bad asking for trivialities like water, or the check.

1062641:0.sentence: This place has got to be the best japanese restaurant in the new york area.

1064477:0.sentence: I tend to judge a sushi restaurant by its sea urchin, which was heavenly at sushi rose.

1064477:2.sentence: The sushi seemed pretty fresh and was adequately proportioned.

1064477:3.sentence: The rice to fish ration was also good--they didn't try to overpack the rice.

1064477:4.sentence: We took advanatage of the half price sushi deal on saturday so it was well worth it.

1074868:3.sentence: In the evening, this place attracted a well dressed, with it, NY crowd.

1074868:4.sentence: The food was well prepared and the service impecable.

1084394:3.sentence: The Prix Fixe menu is worth every penny and you get more than enough (both in quantity AND quality).

1086415:2.sentence: $6 and there is much tasty food, all of it fresh and continually refilled.

1086415:3.sentence: I am not a vegetarian but, almost all the dishes were great.

1086478:0.sentence: The food here is rather good, but only if you like to wait for it.

1086478:1.sentence: I like the somosas, chai, and the chole, but the dhosas and dhal were kinda disappointing.

1086478:2.sentence: The service varys from day to day- sometimes they're very nice, and sometimes not.

1086478:3.sentence: The kitchen however, is almost always slow.

1086478:4.sentence: Also, specify if you like your food spicy- its rather bland if you don't.

1086478:5.sentence: The ambience is pretty and nice for conversation, so a casual lunch here would probably be best.

1090587:2.sentence: Add to that great service and great food at a reasonable price and you have yourself the beginning of a great evening.

1090587:3.sentence: The lava cake dessert was incredible and I recommend it.

1102681:0.sentence: Once you step into Cosette, you're miraculously in a small, off-the-beaten path Parisian bistro.

1102681:1.sentence: This tiny restaurant is as cozy as it gets, with that certain Parisian flair.

1102681:2.sentence: The food was average to above-average; the French Onion soup filling yet not overly impressive, and the desserts not brilliant in any way.

1118167:2.sentence: The pizza was delivered cold and the cheese wasn't even fully melted!

1119578:1.sentence: The pizza is overpriced and soggy.

1119578:2.sentence: Yes, they use fancy ingredients, but even fancy ingredients don't make for good pizza unless someone knows how to get the crust right.

1123262:0.sentence: I think I've had some the best meals of my life at minnow.

1123262:1.sentence: The seafood is amazing, there's a good wine list, and the ever-changing menu always offers some great surprises.

1123262:2.sentence: The combination of super-fresh ingredients in the dishes are unusual but really delicious.

1125006:1.sentence: Best Pastrami I ever had and great portion without being ridiculous.

1125006:3.sentence: My wife had the fried shrimp which are huge and loved it.

1125284:0.sentence: As a Japanese native, I've lived in the Tristate area for over 8 years, but I was just so amazed at this place.

1125284:1.sentence: This place is the most Japanese it can ever get.

1125284:2.sentence: The signs, the specials menus, food, and even all the waitstaff are ALL TOTALLY Japanese.

1125284:3.sentence: This place is worth an one-hour drive.

1126814:0.sentence: Leon is an East Village gem: casual but hip, with well prepared basic French bistro fare, good specials, a warm and lively atmosphere.

1126814:1.sentence: My wife and I always enjoy the young, not always well trained but nevertheless friendly, staff, all of whom have a story.

1126886:1.sentence: This is by far my favorite place in the neighborhood.

1126886:2.sentence: The service is excellent, the decor is great, and the food is delicious and comes in large portions.

1131595:2.sentence: The hostess is rude to the point of being offensive.

1138996:1.sentence: We have been to this place many times, and always have great food, wine, and service.

1138996:2.sentence: We were worried we would have trouble getting in, but somehow managed to have a short wait.

1138996:3.sentence: As always we had a great glass of wine while we waited.

1138996:4.sentence: When we sat, we got great and fast service.

1138996:5.sentence: The people that work there are always so friendly you forget you are in New York sometimes.

1138996:6.sentence: Make sure you try this place as often as you can.

1145510:0.sentence: This is a fun restaurant to go to.

1145510:1.sentence: The pizza is yummy and I like the atmoshpere.

1145510:2.sentence: But the pizza is way to expensive.

1147082:0.sentence: I went there for lunch and it was not as good as I expected from the reviews I read.

opinion_words: not as good as I expected

1147082:1.sentence: Sauce was watery and the food didn't have much flavor.

1147211:2.sentence: The waitress was very patient with us and the food is phenomenal!

1147211:3.sentence: Service was prompt, friendly and great.

1153034:1.sentence: There was a small wait, but shorter than I expected.

1154550:0.sentence: This is the best sushi in new york city - hands down.

1154550:1.sentence: The place is small and cramped but the food is fantastic.

1162037:0.sentence: Planet Thailand has always been a hit with me , I go there usually for the sushi, which is great , the thai food is excellent too .

1162037:1.sentence: With the great variety on the menu , I eat here often and never get bored .

1162037:2.sentence: The atmosphere isn't the greatest , but I suppose that's how they keep the prices down .

1167434:5.sentence: those rolls were big, but not good and sashimi wasn't fresh.

1175958:1.sentence: Try the crunchy tuna, it is to die for.

1189674:0.sentence: First went here to enjoy their garden terrace.

1189674:1.sentence: The food was amazing, and the service was prompt and helpful, but not over-bearing or rushed.

1189674:2.sentence: The Steak Tartare is a great bet, they fix it for you at the table.

1189674:3.sentence: Admittedly some nights inside the restaurant were rather warm, but the open kitchen is part of the charm.

1189674:4.sentence: Great wine selection, Gigondas is worth the price, and the house champagne is a great value.

1189674:5.sentence: It may be a bit packed on weekends, but the vibe is good and it is the best French food you will find in the area.

1189674:6.sentence: Have recommended the place to friends, always gets good response.

1199292:0.sentence: Pizza - the only pizza in NYC that should not have additional toppings - the crust tastes like the best, freshly baked bread!

1199480:0.sentence: Not sure where the previous reviewer, lonk, dined, but Saul is in a great neighborhood and has great food!

1199480:2.sentence: I'd highly recommend it for a special occasion -- it provides and intimate setting and nice service.

1205520:0.sentence: I'm not sure where the other reviewers ate but it seems as if we visited two different restaurants because my friends and I all enjoy Mizu very much... and we're repeat customers.

1212346:0.sentence: Moules were excellent, lobster ravioli was VERY salty!

1212346:4.sentence: Tiny dessert was $8.00...just plain overpriced for what it is.

1221938:0.sentence: The drinks are always well made and wine selection is fairly priced.

1221938:2.sentence: Service is not exactly five star, but thats not really a big deal.

1221938:3.sentence: Downstairs lounge is always a good attraction

1225162:1.sentence: The exotic food is beautifully presented and is a delight in delicious combinations.

1225162:3.sentence: The staff is incredibly helpful and attentive.

1225162:4.sentence: The bar is very well stocked with interesting beers and well priced wines.

1227999:4.sentence: Rude service, medicore food...there are tons of restaurants in NY...stay away from this one

1230993:0.sentence: I had a great time at Jekyll and Hyde!

1230993:1.sentence: I loved everythig about it-especially the shows and actors.

1230993:2.sentence: Our server was very helpful and friendly.

1232468:0.sentence: The tuna and wasabe potatoes are excellent.

1232468:1.sentence: The outdoor atmosphere of sitting on the sidewalk watching the world go by 50 feet away on 6th avenue on a cool evening was wonderful.

1253117:1.sentence: The pizza is delicious - they use fresh mozzarella instead of the cheap, frozen, shredded cheese common to most pizzaria's.

1253117:2.sentence: Two complaints- their appetizer selection stinks, it would be nice to get some mozzarella sticks on the menu.

1253117:5.sentence: Wait staff is blantently unappreciative of your business but its the best pie on the UWS!

1256373:0.sentence: By far the best salad I have had in a fast food restaurant.

1264954:0.sentence: On a recent Sunday afternoon, a friend and I accidently found this great restaurant on our way to see the pulitzer prize winning play DOUBT.

1264954:2.sentence: The chicken pot pie is exceptional, the cheeseburger huge and delictable, and the service professional wan warm.

1269216:3.sentence: When I lived upstate for a while I would buy freeze the bagels and they would still be better than any else.

1269216:4.sentence: Worth visiting the 1st Ave spot because it is the original store.

1275154:4.sentence: He served me an Uni Hand roll, which I never had before, and let me tell you...IT WAS HEAVEN!

1275154:6.sentence: The sake menu should not be overlooked!

1280166:1.sentence: Service was very good - prompt, attentive and non-intrusive.

1280166:2.sentence: Food was very good as well, considering that we tried the budget selection (though I wish the pork belly that I ordered was roasted a bit longer, so that fat was more of a melt-in-your-mouth experience).

1280166:3.sentence: Wine list selection is good and wine-by-the-glass was generously filled to the top.

1280166:4.sentence: Traditional French decour was pleasant though the hall was rather noisy - the restaurant was full and we had to raise our voices to be able to maintain a conversation.

1280179:0.sentence: I've been to at Cafe Spice probably 5-8 times, it is probably still the best Indian restaurant around Union Square.

1280179:1.sentence: To sum it up: Service varies from good to mediorce, depending on which waiter you get; generally it is just average Ok.

1280179:2.sentence: Seating is always prompt, though the restaurant does fill up in the evening.

1280179:3.sentence: Food is usually very good, though ocasionally I wondered about freshmess of raw vegatables in side orders.

1280179:5.sentence: The decor is vibrant and eye-pleasing with several semi-private boths on the right side of the dining hall, which are great for a date.

1286916:0.sentence: I have NEVER been disappointed in the Red Eye.

1286916:1.sentence: The first time I went, and was completely taken by the live jazz band and atmosphere, I ordered the Lobster Cobb Salad.

1286916:3.sentence: It's simply the best meal in NYC.

1287538:0.sentence: If we were to move from the upper east side, we would genuinely miss this restaurant.

1287538:2.sentence: The restaurant is cute but not upscale.

1287538:3.sentence: The food is a diamond in rough -- the food is delicious and homemade with the perfect balance of herbs and tomatoes.

1289424:0.sentence: We had a great time at the Jekyll and hyde Pub last night.

1289424:2.sentence: After really enjoying ourselves at the bar we sat down at a table and had dinner.

1289424:3.sentence: The server was really cool and served us our food and drinks with a smile.

1289424:4.sentence: The place's decor and hidden bathrooms made for a good laugh.

1289424:5.sentence: I highly recommend visiting this restaurant and having dinner and drinks!

1293334:0.sentence: If you are the type of person who likes being scared and entertained, this is a great place to go and eat.

1293334:1.sentence: My husband and I thougt it would be great to go to the Jekyll and Hyde Pub for our anniversary, and to our surprise it was fantastic.

1293334:2.sentence: The have over 100 different beers to offer thier guest so that made my husband very happy and the food was delicious, if I must recommend a dish it must be the pumkin tortelini.

1293334:3.sentence: The entertainment was great they have shows that go on through out the dinner.

1297844:4.sentence: The workers there also absolutely load the bagel with cream cheese (gets a little messy).

1300636:0.sentence: This was my frist time at Cafe St. Bart's and I must say how delicious the food and the service was.

1300636:2.sentence: I have to highly recommend the lobster roll - not to much mayo; you can tell it was a fresh lobster.

1300636:3.sentence: Other guests enjoyed pizza, santa fe chopped salad and fish and chips.

1300636:4.sentence: I highly recommend Cafe St. Bart's for their food, the ambience and wonderful service.

1303888:0.sentence: All the staff is absolutely professional!!

1303984:1.sentence: My chow fun and chow see was really bland and oily.

1303984:3.sentence: The scallion pancakes and fried dumplings were nothing out of the ordinary.

1308557:0.sentence: The service was the only thing good about this restaurant.

1308557:1.sentence: It's boring on the inside, and our sushi was pretty below average... the tuna was soggy and the other rolls had no flavor.

1310217:1.sentence: Their pad penang is delicious and everything else is fantastic.

1310217:2.sentence: The price is reasonable although the service is poor.

1318537:0.sentence: fresh restaurant was amazing........ food was delicious and of course fresh.

1328078:3.sentence: the salads are delicious, both refreshing and very spicy.

1335154:4.sentence: I didn't complain, I liked the atmosphere so much.

1335656:2.sentence: Ambience is so cute and quaint, good for business although we were there on vacation.

1335656:4.sentence: Although we were looking for regular lettuce and some walnuts the salads we got were great.

1335656:5.sentence: Ingredients are organic which is a real plus for me.

1338124:0.sentence: This is some really good, inexpensive sushi.

1338124:2.sentence: The spicy Tuna roll is huge and probably the best that I've had at this price range.

1338124:3.sentence: The Yellowtail was particularly good as well.

1338124:4.sentence: I have reservations about the all you can eat deal, however -- the choices are fairly limited and you can probably order more food than you can eat for less than $18 by just going off the menu.

1340075:0.sentence: Big Wong gets big Ups for a fine establishment.

1340075:1.sentence: They have it all -- great price, food, and service.

1340075:2.sentence: The atmosphere is noisy and the waiters are literally walking around doing things as fast as they can.

1340075:5.sentence: The takeout is great too since they give high quality tupperware as well.

1340075:6.sentence: This place is always very crowded and popular.

1341354:1.sentence: Enjoyed a very nice Caesar Salad while my wife had arugula and goat cheese....both very tasty.

1341354:2.sentence: We both opted for a pasta dish and they were served timely and fresh.

1341354:3.sentence: We concluded with tiramisu chocolate cake, both were delicious.

1347423:0.sentence: I recently went to this restaurant with some co-workers for lunch and had an amazing time.

1347423:1.sentence: The staff was accomodating, the food was absolutely delicious and the place is lovely.

1349391:0.sentence: sometimes i get good food and ok service.

1349391:1.sentence: sometimes i get bad food and bad service, sometimes i get good good and bad service.

1352948:0.sentence: The place is a BISTRO which means: simple dishes and wine served efficiently in a bustling atmosphere.

1352948:3.sentence: And evaluated on those terms Pastis is simply wonderful.

1353599:0.sentence: Right off the L in Brooklyn this is a nice cozy place with good pizza.

1353599:1.sentence: Mine was a little burnt but still delicious with goat cheese and panchetta (raddichio was kind of bitter though).

1353599:2.sentence: My friend got the mushroom pizza which tasted better.

1353599:3.sentence: The sangria was pretty tasty and good on a hot muggy day.

1353599:4.sentence: Kind of a small place but I guess if they are not too busy might be able to fit a group or kids.

1357554:0.sentence: I started out with a Bombay beer which was big enough for two.

1357554:3.sentence: Service was slow, but the people were friendly.

1357554:4.sentence: It's a nice place to relax and have conversation.

1367358:1.sentence: The food is authentic Italian - delicious!

1367358:2.sentence: Pizza is terrific, as is homemade pasta.

1380450:0.sentence: I'm still mad that i had to pay for lousy food.

1380450:1.sentence: The hanger steak was like rubber and the tuna was flavorless not to mention it tasted like it had just been thawed.

1380450:2.sentence: Service was also horrible and the ambience is not that great.

1387314:1.sentence: This is my first time writing a review for a restaurant because the food and service was excellent.

1387314:2.sentence: The filet mignon dish was superb!

1390357:2.sentence: I like the ambience, it's very dark and original.

1394712:3.sentence: We won't go to this place again for a good meal.

1394712:4.sentence: However, I think this place is a good hang out spot.

1395421:0.sentence: My Girlfriend and I stumbled onto this hopping place the other night and had a great time!

1395421:1.sentence: THe Pizza and wine were excellent-the service too--but what really MADE this place was the backyard dining area.

1395421:2.sentence: It is one the nicest outdoor restaurants I have ever seen in NY--I am from Italy and this place rivals the ones in my country.

1398844:0.sentence: First of all, this place is *not* romantic, as claimed by Citysearch's editorial review.

1398844:2.sentence: The tables are crammed way too close, the menu is typical of any Italian restaurant, and the wine list is simply overpriced.

1398844:3.sentence: Slightly above average wines start at $70+ with only one selection listed at $30+.

1398844:4.sentence: Service is not what one would expect from a joint in this price category.

1398844:6.sentence: Somehow working the italian charm with constant mille grazie does not constitute proper service.

1398844:7.sentence: To be completely fair, the only redeeming factor was the food, which was above average, but couldn't make up for all the other deficiencies of Teodora.

1404042:1.sentence: Not one of our meals was edible - bland and/or made with weird rosemary or orange flavoring.

1404042:3.sentence: Cute place, nice wait staff but would never go there again.

1404042:4.sentence: Someone else recommended the dessert - we also left that.

1404042:5.sentence: One of us actually liked the expresso - that's it.

1404042:6.sentence: Skip this restaurant, it's a big disappointment.

1410878:0.sentence: Myagi is one of my favorite restaurants in the City; the place the negative reviews describe sound like they were somewhere else.

1410878:1.sentence: I've never had bad service and the fish is fresh and delicious.

1410878:2.sentence: Their tuna tartar appetizer is to die for.

1413697:0.sentence: I come from a family of pizzeria owners, and I'm almost ashamed to say that the pizza in Fornino's blows my families receipies away.

1413697:2.sentence: The place is so cool and the service is prompt and curtious.

1413697:3.sentence: I highly recommend to anyone to give this place a try.

1417496:0.sentence: A restaurant that doesn't try to do anything except serve great food with great service in a pleasant atmosphere.

1417496:2.sentence: The dining room is quietly elegant with no music to shout over -- how refreshing!

1417496:3.sentence: The service was impeccable and unobtrusive -- the staff knows what they are there to do -- to know their menu, present your meal, and attend to your needs.

1417496:4.sentence: Looking around, I saw a room full of New Yorkers enjoying a real meal in a real restaurant, not a clubhouse of the fabulous trying to be seen.

1430994:0.sentence: The view is breathtaking the service is top notch... the ambiance is wonderfull.

1430994:3.sentence: My boyfriend had the New England Chowder it was good but I think the award should go to the Lobster Bisque.

1430994:6.sentence: My boyfriend had Prime Rib it was good .

1430994:7.sentence: We didn't want a bottle of bubbly on a weekday so we each got little bottles of Korbett it was just enough.

1431154:1.sentence: If you like spicy food get the chicken vindaloo.

1432551:0.sentence: Go to Volare for 1st class service and terrific food.

1432551:1.sentence: The portions are large and the servers always surprise us with a different starter.

1439875:0.sentence: The food is amazing... especially if you get the Chef's tasting menu and your favourite bottle (or two!) of wine from an extensive selection of wines.

1439875:1.sentence: The place is small and intimate and you may feel a little crowded, but the service is excellent and it's great for friends out, a romantic date, or a special occassion.

1439875:3.sentence: The food can get pricey but the prixe fixe tasting menu is the greatest food for a good price and they cater the food to any food allergies or food you don't like.

1448587:0.sentence: With the exception of our lemon salad that had so much pepper on it that our eyes started watering, the food here was decent, not great.

1448587:1.sentence: The menu is very limited - i think we counted 4 or 5 entrees.

1448587:2.sentence: We ordered the special, grilled branzino, that was so infused with bone, it was difficult to eat.

1448587:3.sentence: The decor in this place is very diner-ish and the kind of place you expect in the East Village - not romantic, just simple, small and sparse.

1448587:4.sentence: Problem is nothing at Prune is particularly memorable.

1451107:0.sentence: This place is so much fun.

1451107:1.sentence: Our family never expected such incredible entertainment in a restaurant.

1451107:6.sentence: The staff was the friendliest that have seen in New York.

1451109:0.sentence: If you want something really different than try Jekyll and Hyde.

1451109:2.sentence: The food was pretty tradional but it was hot and good with large portions.

1457607:0.sentence: The place is a lot of fun.

1457607:2.sentence: The characters really make for an enjoyable experience.

1457607:3.sentence: The food however, is what one might expect.

1457607:5.sentence: However, I think Jeckll and Hydes t is one of those places that is fun to do once.

1459569:1.sentence: Service was slow had to wait to order and get food although not crowded.

1459569:3.sentence: Food was good not great not worth the wait or another visit

opinion_words: not worth the wait or another visit

1470286:0.sentence: Whenever you need a Sushi fix, Mizu will be there with quality fish and great service.

1470286:2.sentence: Great friendly service, Fast seating, Fast Delivery, Excellent sushi.

1470334:1.sentence: Ess-A-Bagel (either by Sty-town or midtown) is by far the best bagel in NY.

1470334:2.sentence: The bagels always warm, soft on the inside, crispy on the outside and enormous in size.

1470334:3.sentence: They have a huge selection of different cream cheeses and all of their salads are great.

1470334:4.sentence: The lox is always fresh too.

1471273:3.sentence: Prices too high for this cramped and unappealing resturant.

1476493:0.sentence: I thought this place was totally overrated.

1476493:2.sentence: The ambience was nice, but service wasn't so great.

1477631:0.sentence: This is the BEST Shabu-Shabu Restaurant in the Try-State Area.

1477631:2.sentence: Thius is a must for anyone who loves Shabu-Shabu.

1486041:0.sentence: The atmosphere is nothing special, but it feels like a Sushi establishment in Tokyo.

1486041:1.sentence: The owner and staff are all Japanese as well and that adds to the entire ambiance.

1486041:2.sentence: Despite a slightly limited menu, everything prepared is done to perfection, ultra fresh and a work of food art.

1496205:1.sentence: The location and ambience is Ok but the food is what makes up for it.

1496205:4.sentence: The quantity is also very good, you will come out satisfied.

1496205:5.sentence: The service is ok, some of the people didn't get what they asked for.

1496707:1.sentence: I had the best ravioli ever.

1496707:2.sentence: The wine the service was very good too.

1500453:1.sentence: This quaint and romantic trattoria is at the top of my Manhattan restaurant list.

1500453:2.sentence: The food is delicious - from the specials to the regular menu-fare, the dishes are never a disappointment.

1500453:4.sentence: Although the tables may be closely situated, the candle-light, food-quality and service overcompensate.

1506491:1.sentence: If you go, try the marinara/arrabiatta sauce, the mozzarella en Carozza is mmmmmmmm..... everything is just delicious.

1506491:2.sentence: Check out the secret back room.

1538149:0.sentence: I found the food, service and value exceptional everytime I have been there.

1538149:3.sentence: The service was excellent - friendly and attentive.

1543345:1.sentence: Who has room for Cheesesticks with the best pizza in NYC!

1561259:0.sentence: The food is good, I can't lie.

1561259:1.sentence: But the staff was so horrible to us.

1561259:2.sentence: The hostess and the waitress were incredibly rude and did everything they could to rush us out.

1561259:4.sentence: This place is pricey, and yes, the food is worth it; but the service makes you feel like you should be paying a quater of the price.

1572027:3.sentence: I ate here a week ago and found most dishes average at best and too expensive.

1572033:0.sentence: Don't dine at Tamarind for the vegetarian dishes, they are simply not up to par with the non-veg selections.

1572033:1.sentence: Decor is nice though service can be spotty.

1573534:3.sentence: I am happy i did the food was awsome.

1573534:5.sentence: and yes Dal Bukhara is so dam good and so are all the kababs.

1577714:1.sentence: Haru on Park S is simply disgusting.

1577714:2.sentence: The fish was not fresh and the rice tasted old and stale.

1577714:3.sentence: Quite frankly, this is some of the worst sushi I have ever tried.

1586174:0.sentence: honestly the worst sushi my husband and i had in our entire lives.

1586174:2.sentence: not sure why this restaurant would be rated that highly.

1586174:3.sentence: the all-u-can-eat sushi is definitely in very poor quality.

1586174:4.sentence: limited menu, no-so-fresh ingredients, thinly-sliced fish, fall-apart rice.

1586174:5.sentence: the only things u could really taste are the very salty soy sauce (even its low sodium), the vinegar-soaked rice, and the scallion on top of the fish.

1603698:5.sentence: The dinner was ok, nothing I would have again.

1603698:6.sentence: I had their eggs benedict for brunch, which were the worst in my entire life, I tried removing the hollondaise sauce completely that was how failed it was.

1609375:1.sentence: We love the food, drinks, and atmosphere!

490565:0.sentence: As a retired hipster, I can say with some degree of certainty that for the last year Lucky Strike has been the best laid-back late night in the city.

490565:1.sentence: The wait staff is pleasant, fun, and for the most part gorgeous (in the wonderful aesthetic beautification way, not in that she's-way-cuter-than-me-that-b@#$* way).

490565:2.sentence: The food is yummy, especially their cooked-to-perfection mussels in spicy tomato sauce and their shoestring crispy fries.

490565:3.sentence: But the best part about LS is the late night atmosphere, delightfully free of the BTs.

490565:4.sentence: You can get a completely delish martini in a glass (that's about 2 1/2 drinks) for $8.50 (I recommend the Vanilla Shanty, mmmm!) in a great homey setting with great music.

490565:5.sentence: The in-house lady DJ on Saturday nights has outrageously good taste in music, and moreover, takes requests.

490565:6.sentence: You can't go wrong with this place.

735448:3.sentence: even the wine by the glass was good.

737999:2.sentence: Always good drinks and service is pretty good;

737999:3.sentence: Atmosphere is nice and relaxed too...

737999:4.sentence: A great place to meet up for some food and drinks...

740923:1.sentence: If you don't mind pre-sliced low quality fish, unfriendly staff and a sushi chef that looks like he is miserable then this is your place.

744478:1.sentence: Fabulous decor - makes you feel like you're in a trendy Manhattan restaurant, very very good food, cheaply-priced, generally friendly staff, and if you're a Manhattanite, or spend most of your time in Manhattan, Rice Avenue will make you feel at home.....very Soho/Village/Upper West Side minus the expensive prices and pretentious clientele.....all on Roosevelt Avenue!

746254:2.sentence: One would think we'd get an apology or complimentary drinks - instead, we got a snobby waiter wouldn't even take our order for 15 minutes and gave us lip when we asked him to do so.

746254:4.sentence: With so many good restaurants on the UWS, I don't need overpriced food, absurdly arrogant wait-staff who don't recognize they work at a glorified diner, clumsy service, and management that doesn't care.

751493:0.sentence: I am relatively new to the area and tried Pick a bgel on 2nd and was disappointed with the service and I thought the food was overated and on the pricey side.

754495:2.sentence: The food is okay and the prices here are mediocre.

757762:0.sentence: Baluchi's has solid food and a nice decor at reasonable prices.

757762:1.sentence: The only problem is that the manager is a complete incompetent.

757762:2.sentence: He offers subpar service and has no personality.

757762:5.sentence: There is no excuse for such lousy service!

758263:0.sentence: I have never before eaten 40 pieces of relatively good nigiri.

758263:3.sentence: $20 for all you can eat sushi cannot be beaten.

759781:0.sentence: I went to Areo on a Sunday afternoon with four of my girlfriends, and spent three enjoyable hours there.

759781:2.sentence: Most of the servers are very attentive, friendly and quite attractive.

759781:4.sentence: The vibe is very relaxed and cozy, service was great and the food was excellent!

773720:0.sentence: Food was good and the view of the new york city skiline was terrific even on a foggy rainy day like that of when I went.

773720:0_1.term: view of the new york city skiline

773720:1.sentence: I would highly recommand requesting a table by the window.

773720:2.sentence: Although they do the typical what kind of water would you like questions the service was good and overall very relaxing to place to eat.

872763:2.sentence: Personal pans are the perfect size for those hungry nights.

872763:4.sentence: There is a downside if you're ordering in -- the delivery guys have MAJOR attitude.

872763:5.sentence: Never have I had such dramatic delivery guys (a lot of huffing and panting and muttering under breath b/c I live in a walkup) who always seem disappointed with their tips.

875139:0.sentence: Love the scene first off- the place has a character and nice light to it..very fortunate, location wise.

875139:1.sentence: The pizza was pretty good and huge.

875139:3.sentence: We were 4 and got the family size penne a la vodka which was tremendously gigantic portion...a bucket of food literally.

875139:6.sentence: The pasta penne was pretty extra buttery, creamy which means a big task to diggest.. tasty at first but i would say that i was full with a slice of pizza and 7 to count, penne...got a little moody afterwards cause was stuffed...lol

929329:2.sentence: La Rosa waltzes in, and I think they are doing it the best.

929329:3.sentence: Interesting selection, good wines, service fine, fun decor.

935633:3.sentence: I found it on a cold night, the perfect spot to warm up.

935633:4.sentence: I recieved prompt service with a smile.

955711:0.sentence: This place blew me away...by far my new favorite restaurant on the uppereast side.

955711:1.sentence: The wine list is extensive and impressive.

955711:2.sentence: LOVE the atmosphere - felt like I was in Paris.

955711:3.sentence: The mussels were fantastic and so was the dessert...definitely going to be back very soon.

957145:1.sentence: I have been coming here for years and have nothing but good things to say about the service and the great staff at La Lanterna.

957145:2.sentence: Over the years the host, Vittorio, and his crew, have always treated me as family--although with all the business this not-so-little gem does, it amazing he's even able to remember a consistent but not-so-frequent visitor.

957145:3.sentence: I've also been amazed at all the new additions in the past few years: A new Jazz Bar, the most fantastic Dining Garden, the Best Thin Crust Pizzas, and now a Lasagna Menu which is to die for (these are not your average lasagnas)!

958809:1.sentence: I have to say I have never had a disapointing meal here.

958809:2.sentence: We could have made a meal of the yummy dumplings from the dumpling menu.

958809:3.sentence: Luckily we saved room for the BBQ Salmon, Sea Bass and Crispy Duck.
